value.title: Power BI Tutorial: How to Sign up
value.excerpt: Do you want to get started using Power BI? After getting Power BI Desktop, you will want to sign up for the Power BI service. In this video, we show you how to do just that! The process is pretty straightforward using your corporate email address. We do call out one gotcha in the even that your admins

value.title: Preventing Data Silos with Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick and Kalyn look at data silos and how to prevent it using Power BI. Different options exist, such as Analysis Services, Azure Analysis Services or models hosted in the Power BI service.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube --

value.title: Report level measures with Power BI live connections
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at how you can create report level measures, within Power BI Desktop, against SQL Server Analysis Services Tabular live connections, or against a Power BI service dataset live connection. He also explains what is meant by report level measures. Bust out your DAX toolbelt

value.title: Shared & Certified datasets in Power BI
value.excerpt: Let's take a look at the new shared and certified datasets feature in Power BI Desktop and the Power BI service. value.title: Test your Power BI DAX measures in DAX Studio
value.excerpt: Learn how to get your DAX measures in working order, using DAX Studio, before putting them in your Power BI report. Patrick walks you through it! value.title: Tracing with Log Analytics and Power BI
value.excerpt: With Log Analytics integration in Power BI, you can now capture Analysis Services trace events easily and over a longer period of time. Combined with the Power BI template report, you can gain a lot of insights into usage of your datasets. With more to come down the road!  Announcing long-term usage

value.title: Using DAX to format a list of values in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Alberto Ferrari joins Patrick to walk through how you can use DAX to format a list of values within Power BI Desktop. This takes the concatenate values quick measure to the next level.  Original Quick Measure video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjSKCZtiNlI  Alberto's article - https://www.sqlbi.com/blog/alberto/2018/12/20/displaying-a-list-of-selected-months/

value.title: Using Single Sign-on with the Power BI Gateway
value.excerpt: Let's dig into the Power BI gateway and Single Sign-On (SSO) using Kerberos!  This can be used for both DirectQuery and refreshing a Power BI dataset. value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach. Adam explores the data protection capabilities within Power BI using security labels and cloud app security.  Data Protection documentation overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-security-data-protection-overview
